rdfgears.rgl.workflow
Interface Expression

All Known Implementing Classes:
BagValue, ConstantExpression, EndpointGraphValue, GraphValue, LazilyIteratingBagValue, LazyExpression, LiteralValue, MemoryBagValue, MemoryGraphValue, MemoryLiteralValue, MemoryRecordValue, MemoryURIValue, RDFValue, RecordValue, RGLValue, URIValue
public interface Expression

An Expression contains an operation an a number of values; evaluating it yields a new value. Thus there are no free variables in an Expression.

Author:
Eric Feliksik

Method Summary
 RGLValue evaluate()
          Evaluate this expression to an RGL value.

Evaluate this expression to an RGL value.
